alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:01PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pueblo County through 130 PM MDT... At 101 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pueblo Reservoir, or 10 miles southwest of Pueblo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo Reservoir, Salt Creek, Blende and Pueblo West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
